para: This format is designed to read the XML emitted when you use the Google Directions API.
If you use a Unix-compatible operating system, this shell script might be useful:
programlisting: #!/bin/sh FROM="233 S. Upper Wacker Dr, Chicago, IL" TO="1060 W. Addison St, Chicago, IL" URL="http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/directions/xml" wget -O - "$URL?origin=$FROM&destination=$TO&sensor=false" \ 2>/dev/null >google_map.xml gpsbabel -i googledir -f google_map.xml -o gpx -F google_map.gpx
